body: These costs include ongoing or recurring costs for your buildings, organizations, and other previous downtime activities that have accrued since the last time you have had a downtime session. Most of these costs are incurred daily, whether or not you are spending downtime days at the settlement.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime/Downtime Phases/Upkeep Phase/Step 1-Add Up Costs
name: Step 1-Add Up Costs
